commands.title: Responsive Meta Tags
commands.body:
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

<meta name="keywords" content="{{keywords}}">

commands.title: HTML Form Template
commands.body:
<form action="{{action url}}" method="POST">
    <label for="name">Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>
    
    <label for="email">Email:</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
    
    <label for="message">Message:</label>
    <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>
    
    <button type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
commands.description: Basic contact form structure with validation

commands.title: GitHub Actions: Basic workflow template
commands.body:
name: {{Workflow Name}}

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: {{Step Name}}
      run: {{command}}
commands.description: Basic GitHub Actions workflow YAML structure

commands.title: GitHub Actions: Node.js workflow
commands.body:
name: Node.js CI

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: '{{node version}}'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm install
      
    - name: Run tests
      run: npm test
commands.description: GitHub Actions workflow for Node.js projects

commands.title: GitHub Actions: Docker build and push
commands.body:
name: Docker Build

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Build Docker image
      run: docker build -t {{image name}}:{{tag}} .
      
    - name: Push to registry
      run: |
        echo ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }} | docker login -u ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }} --password-stdin
        docker push {{image name}}:{{tag}}
commands.description: Build and push Docker images in GitHub Actions

commands.title: GitHub Actions: Using secrets
commands.description: Access GitHub secrets in workflow steps

commands.title: GitHub Actions: Cron schedule
commands.body:
on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '{{minute}} {{hour}} * * *'  # Daily at specific time
commands.description: Trigger workflow on schedule (cron syntax: min hour day month weekday)

commands.title: GitLab CI: Basic pipeline
commands.body:
stages:
  - build
  - test
  - deploy

build:
  stage: build
  script:
    - {{build command}}

test:
  stage: test
  script:
    - {{test command}}

deploy:
  stage: deploy
  script:
    - {{deploy command}}
  only:
    - main
commands.description: Basic GitLab CI/CD pipeline configuration

commands.title: GitLab CI: Docker build job
commands.body:
docker-build:
  image: docker:latest
  services:
    - docker:dind
  stage: build
  script:
    - docker build -t {{image name}} .
    - docker push {{image name}}
commands.description: Build Docker images in GitLab CI

commands.title: GitLab CI: Using variables
commands.description: Define and use variables in GitLab CI

commands.title: GitLab CI: Cache dependencies
commands.body:
cache:
  paths:
    - node_modules/
    - .npm/

job:
  script:
    - npm install
commands.description: Cache dependencies between pipeline runs

commands.title: GitLab CI: Artifacts
commands.body:
job:
  script:
    - {{build command}}
  artifacts:
    paths:
      - {{output directory}}/
    expire_in: 1 week
commands.description: Save build artifacts for download or later stages

commands.title: GitLab CI: Manual deployment
commands.body:
deploy:
  stage: deploy
  script:
    - {{deploy command}}
  when: manual
  only:
    - main
commands.description: Require manual trigger for deployment job

commands.title: GitHub Actions: Matrix strategy
commands.body:
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        node-version: [18, 20, 22]
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
      with:
        node-version: ${{ matrix.node-version }}
commands.description: Test across multiple versions using matrix strategy

commands.title: n8n Docker: Full docker-compose stack
commands.body:
version: '3.8'
services:
  n8n:
    image: n8nio/n8n:latest
    container_name: n8n
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "5678:5678"
    environment:
      - N8N_HOST={{your-domain.com}}
      - N8N_PROTOCOL=https
      - WEBHOOK_URL=https://{{your-domain.com}}
      - N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY={{your-encryption-key}}
      - DB_TYPE=postgresdb
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST=postgres
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_DATABASE=n8n
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_USER=n8n
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_PASSWORD={{db-password}}
    volumes:
      - n8n_data:/home/node/.n8n
    depends_on:
      - postgres
  
  postgres:
    image: postgres:16
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=n8n
      - POSTGRES_USER=n8n
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{db-password}}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  n8n_data:
  postgres_data:
commands.description: Production-ready docker-compose for n8n with PostgreSQL - complete setup (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Queue mode docker-compose
commands.body:
version: '3.8'
services:
  n8n-main:
    image: n8nio/n8n:latest
    container_name: n8n-main
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "5678:5678"
    environment:
      - EXECUTIONS_MODE=queue
      - QUEUE_BULL_REDIS_HOST=redis
      - DB_TYPE=postgresdb
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST=postgres
      - N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY={{encryption-key}}
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - redis
  
  n8n-worker:
    image: n8nio/n8n:latest
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: worker
    environment:
      - EXECUTIONS_MODE=queue
      - QUEUE_BULL_REDIS_HOST=redis
      - DB_TYPE=postgresdb
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST=postgres
      - N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY={{encryption-key}}
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - redis
  
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    restart: unless-stopped
  
  postgres:
    image: postgres:16
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=n8n
      - POSTGRES_USER=n8n
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{password}}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:
commands.description: n8n queue mode with workers for horizontal scaling - production setup (docs.n8n.io/hosting/scaling/queue-mode/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Install n8n with Helm
commands.body:
helm repo add community-charts https://community-charts.github.io/helm-charts
helm repo update
kubectl create namespace n8n
helm install n8n community-charts/n8n --namespace n8n

commands.title: n8n K8s: Install n8n with custom values
commands.body:
helm install n8n community-charts/n8n \
  --namespace n8n \
  --set config.host={{your-domain.com}} \
  --set config.protocol=https \
  --set postgresql.enabled=true \
  --set redis.enabled=true \
  --set scaling.enabled=true
